name: nebraskan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Nebraska: The average white Nebraskan will live to 78. Nebraskans believe it is important to provide college educations for their children.
More examplesFewer examplesJohanns will be the fourth Nebraskan to serve as secretary of agriculture.The initiative is intended to lure Nebraskans living out of state back home.The program will serve the best interest of all Nebraskans.

belonging or relating to the US state of Nebraska or its people: A Nebraskan billionaire stepped in to save the stricken company. The book is by Nebraskan novelist Kate M. Cleary.
More examplesFewer examplesThe poem caught the attention of the Nebraskan composer Howard Hanson.Houston Natural Gas was merged with a Nebraskan company called Inter-North.The YouTube channel was started by a fourteen-year-old rural Nebraskan kid.
